  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Kursenai. Dati di base</string>
            <string language="en">Kursenai. Basic Data</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursenai. Grundlegende Daten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kursenai. Données de base</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Kursenai. Dados Básicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kursenai. Βασικά στοιχεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kursenai. Datos Básicos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo Lo è progettato per gli insegnanti e gli allievi della zona di Kursenai, una piccola città in nel nord-ovest della Lituania ed eventualmente,  per partner europei di progetto. Pricipalmente mette a fuoco la storia del posto e della sua gente, allo stesso tempo sfiora alcuni fatti di base di geografia e di cultura. Gli insegnanti di inglese possono trovare utile  questo LO  per far  esercitare/ rivedere le  preposizioni. Vi si trovano due serie di attività: 5 brevi esercizi Cloze(5 parti ciascuno) e 5 quiz a scelta multipla (3 parti ciascuno).</string>
            <string language="en">This LO is designed for teachers and students of the area of Kursenai, a small town in north-west Lithuania, and, possibly, for their European project partners. It mainly focuses on the history of the place and its people, at the same time touching upon some basic facts of geography and culture. 
Teachers of English may find the LO useful for practicing/revising prepositions.
The LO is composed of two sets of activities: 5 short cloze exercises (5 items each)and 5 short multiple-choice quizzes(3 items each).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Kuršėnai</string>
            <string language="en">Kuršėnai</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE ist für Lehrer und Kursteilnehmer
des Bereiches von Kursenai, eine kleine Stadt in Nordwestlitauen und 
vielleicht für ihre europäischen Projektpartner konzipiert. Es
konzentriert hauptsächlich auf die Geschichte des Platzes und seine 
Leute, wirken gleichzeitig sich einige grundlegende Tatsachen von 
Geographie und von Kultur aus. Lehrer von Englisch können das 
NIEDRIGE nützliche für NIEDRIGES practicing/revising 
prepositions.The finden besteht aus zwei Sets Aktivitäten: 5 
kurze cloze Übungen (5 Einzelteile each)and 5 kurze Mehrfachwahl 
quizzes(3 Einzelteile jedes).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS est conçu pour les professeurs et les 
étudiants de la zone de Kursenai, une petite ville en Lithuanie du 
nord-ouest, et, probablement, pour leurs associés européens de 
projet. Il se concentre principalement sur l'histoire de 
l'endroit et ses personnes, évoquent en même temps quelques faits de
base de géographie et de culture. Les professeurs de l'anglais 
peuvent trouver le BAS utile pour practicing/revising prepositions.The
BAS se compose de deux ensembles d'activités : 5 exercices 
Cloze courts (5 éléments courts chacun de multiple-choix quizzes(3 
d'each)and 5 d'éléments).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO é projetado para os professores e os 
estudantes da área de Kursenai, uma cidade pequena em Lithuania 
noroeste, e, possivelmente, para seus sócios europeus do projeto. 
Focaliza principalmente no history do lugar e de seus povos, ao 
mesmo tempo tocando em cima de alguns fatos básicos da geografia e da
cultura. Os professores do inglês podem encontrar o útil BAIXO
para practicing/revising prepositions.The BAIXO são compostos de dois
jogos das atividades: 5 exercícios cloze curtos (5 artigos 
curtos cada um da múltiplo-escolha quizzes(3 do each)and 5 dos 
artigos).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO σχεδιάζεται για τους δασκάλους και τους 
σπουδαστές της περιοχής Kursenai, μια μικρή πόλη στη 
βορειοδυτική Λιθουανία, και, ενδεχομένως, για τους ευρωπαϊκούς 
συνεργάτες προγράμματός τους. Εστιάζει κυρίως στην ιστορία
της θέσης και των ανθρώπων της, αγγίζοντας συγχρόνως μερικά 
βασικά γεγονότα της γεωγραφίας και του πολιτισμού. Οι 
δάσκαλοι των αγγλικών μπορούν να βρούν το LO χρήσιμο για/τις 
προθέσεις Το LO αποτελείται από δύο σύνολα 
δραστηριοτήτων: 5 σύντομες cloze ασκήσεις (5 αντικείμενα 
each)and 5 σύντομα πολλαπλής επιλογής quizzes(3 αντικείμενα 
κάθε ένα).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO se diseña para los profesores y los 
estudiantes del área de Kursenai, una ciudad pequeña en Lituania del
noroeste, y, posiblemente, para sus socios europeos del proyecto. 
Se centra principalmente en la historia del lugar y su gente, en
el mismo tiempo roza algunos hechos básicos de la geografía y de la 
cultura. Los profesores del inglés pueden encontrar el útil 
BAJO para practicing/revising prepositions.The BAJO se componen de dos
conjuntos de actividades: 5 ejercicios cloze cortos (5 items 
cortos cada uno de la mu'ltiple-opcio'n quizzes(3 del each)and 5 de 
los items).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kur??nai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Kur??nai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Kur??nai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Kur??nai</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Kur??nai</string>
          </keyword>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">U-U</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli esercizi sono ideati per far pratica sulle preposizioni. Gli studenti consolideranno o rivedranno le loro conoscenze sulle preposizioni di luogo, tempo, etc. e svilupperanno le loro abilità nell'utilizzarle. Allo stesso tempo, impareranno/ rivedranno fatti riguardo alla loro città/zona di nascita ed arricchiranno le loro conoscenze e la loro capacità di comprensione del luogo  in cui vivono. Le attività di quiz sono designate per aiutare gli studenti a controllare/ verificare le loro conoscenze di dati basilari su Kursenai e soprattutto importanti fatti storici.</string>
            <string language="en">The cloze exercises are designed for teaching/learning prepositions. Students will consolidate/revise their knowledge of prepositions of place, time, etc. and will develop their skills in using them.
 Alongside, they will get to know/learn/revise basic facts about their native town/area and will enrich their background knowledge and understanding about the area they live in. 
 The quiz activities are designed to help students check/evaluate their knowledge of the basic data about Kursenai, mainly, the most important historical facts.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
